extension.name: Hikashop Geolocation Plugin
extension.author: Hikashop
extension.description: This plugin enables you to handle geolocation

param.name: geoloc_timeout
param.label: Timeout
param.description: The timeout value after which the connexion to the geolocation server is considered failed (in sec)

param.name: geoloc_service
param.label: Geolocation service
param.description: Select here the geolocation service that you want to use

param.name: geoloc_api_key
param.label: API key
param.description: Your IPInfoDB service's API key that you can get on http://ipinfodb.com/register.php

param.name: set_default_currency
param.label: Set currency
param.description: Select currency based on the geolocated zone of the user

param.name: blocked_zones
param.label: Zones blocked
param.description: Block the people in these zones (provide a list of zone ids separated by commas)

param.name: authorized_zones
param.label: Zones authorized
param.description: Authorize the people in these zones (provide a list of zone ids separated by commas). If filled, the blocked zones will be ignored

param.name: components
param.label: Components checked
param.description: Check zones access only for these components (provide a list of component folder names separated by commas)
